Broken Heart Syndrome Versus Heart Attack
                
Symptoms of broken heart syndrome can look like those of a heart attack.
                
Most heart attacks are caused by blockages and blood clots forming in the coronary arteries, which supply the heart with blood. If these clots cut off the blood supply to the heart for a long enough period of tim
